about_the_game:
Plunge into the people’s most secret wishes and desires! You and your partner Scott have a lot of work to do. A man was murdered with a red hyacinth left on his body – the sign of a notorious serial killer from many years ago. You find out that your psychologist Mark Coleman was involved, and then he kills your boss Xavier. You have to get him behind bars as soon as possible, but there is another urgent matter: people are disappearing from their cars. Then the journalist Noah Hall, who got famous due to covering the Red Hyacinth, was murdered as well... Suddenly you will start to see Mark's side of what happened, and maybe even gain some sympathy for the guy. Can you stop this wave of crime? Are you ready to apply your brilliant detective mind to do that? Challenge your investigator skills in this spectacular new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

♟️ Your own choices!
You have the opportunity to choose the character's phrases for a particular action and influence the plot of the detective visual novel. Put your own psychologist under a microscope, but don’t let the truth ruin your faith in people!

♟️ A variety of achievements!
Conduct your own investigation solving intricate puzzles, challenging riddles and playing various mini-games. You have been given access to the personal files of the therapist's patients, you need to carefully examine them and find all the hidden objects to earn achievements and highlight your success as a real detective!

♟️ Intriguing investigation!
Leading this investigation you will search case files, find evidence and hidden objects, interview suspects, solve tricky puzzles and reveal the terrible truth! Some crime cases look impossible to solve, but you can do it, can you?

♟️ Collectible items!
Detective story is full of collector’s items and objects that the player needs to find in order to advance in the investigation! Search the crime scene and the therapist's office for hidden objects keeping the eye out for many exciting collectibles. Immerse yourself in the criminal atmosphere of this unsolved case!
